title: Bean salad with herrings
ingredients: ['250g butter beans', '4 soused herring fillets', '480ml milk', '2 apples, peeled and grated', '2 pickled cucumbers, diced', '1 onion, chopped', '4 tablespoons pickled mushrooms, diced', '2 gherkins, diced', '5 tablespoons mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
